description:
Mô Tả Công Việc
             

              Địa điểm làm việc:  111A Pasteur, District 1, HCMC
              

              POSITION SUMMARY
              
              - To manage company licenses registration/renewal for import and transport permits with regards to all Sales Departments with local authorities to import successfully
              
              - Provide up to date information regarding all laws and regulation relates to company business operations in order to make the company comply with those relevant laws/regulations.
              
              - Monitor related new laws and regulations to support all Sales Department units of       Company and give guidelines to Department Managers to avoid business risk.
              
              - To be a member of ISO committee to prepare for manual, procedures, work instruction
              
              - To control business operation compliance
              

              MAJOR RESPONSIBILITIES
              
              -        Responsible for Country logistics compliance mainly are:
              
              -        Country product HS code
              
              -        Country product license/ permit including other local requirements (import, export, trade, transport, store, transform of packaging, tax benefit)
              
              -        Management of change in local & international regulations relating to HS code, import, export, trade, transport, store, transform of packaging, tax benefit.
              
              -        Communication of update/change in relating to regulatory
              
              -        Responsible for implement and in charge of New Product Creation process
              
              -        Act as process owner and responsible for ensuring all regulatory process have carry out correctly (by internal or service provider)
              
              -        In charge of regulatory service provider selection, evaluation, approve process/ procedure, approve job completion.
              
              -        Manage regulatory filing, record retention per company and local regulation requirement and effectively communicate to team.
              
              -        Lead country regulatory data base initiatives and ensure status are update.
              
              -        Work hand in hand with logistics, DMs, BLHs to maintain process effectiveness and competitive advantage
              
              -        Maintain regulatory affair relation both in and external
              
              -        In charge of internal & external regulatory audit and communicate to CM, BLH, RSCM
              

              Regulations
              
              - Provide management team with up to date information regarding all laws and regulations affecting registration and company business
              
              - Provide opinion / consulting basing on research of relevant rules and regulations in order to make the company comply with relevant laws
              
              - Review relevant reports for correctness prior to authorization of the management
              
              - Monitor company business activities to be compliance with laws & regulations
              
              - Communicate in term of the amendment for updated information of license i.e. new business unit and new distribution channel
              

              Company license
              
              - Responsible for annual renewal of licenses and any changes such as license holder, warehouse, pharmacist etc.
              

              Import and Transport Permit
              
              - Responsible for Import and Transport Permits in order to comply with all laws and/or legal procedures
             

              Xem toàn bộ Mô Tả Công Việc
requirement:
Yêu Cầu Công Việc
             

              -        Degree from law school or equivalent
              
              -        3-5 years working experience with government organizations.
              
              -        Experienced with registration work (I.e. licenses, products)
              
              -        Good interpersonal skills
              
              -        Able to work independently
              
              -        Must be computer literate  (MS office, PowerPoint, E-mail, Internet)
              
              -        Very Good command of spoken, reading and written English.
